_header: O glorious God our governor gladden all this guesting
Versification: — nine-line, eight-line, four-line — aaaabcccb, aaabcccb, aaaa
_description: The Tale of the Lady Prioress and her Three Suitors — mixed stanzaic forms, some monorhyming (aaaa), some 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb), some 9-line stanzas (aaaabcccb)

BLHar78.First Lines:
O gloryus God oure goeuernor glad in alle this gesttyngAnd gyfe
                    them ioye that wyll here whatt I shall saye or syng…
BLHar78.Last Lines:
…thus the lady ded fre she kepyth her vyrgenyteAnd indewed the
                    place wyth ffee and salvyd them of ther soore
